creator: pieter.bloemendaal@spmtechnologies.com
text:
You have a typing error in the documentation for the Ant Checksum task,
the readbuffersize option says 

   The size of the buffer )in bytes) to use when reading a file. 

)in bytes)   should be    (in bytes)

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text: Thanks for the report, fixed now in cvs.
